artist: Kawase Hasui; Publisher: Kawaguchi Jirō; Carver: Maeda Kentarō; Printer: Komatsu Wasankichi
inscription: bottom margin: 昭和五年作 {Shōwa gonen saku} (made in 1930)
markings: LRC, red round artist's seal: 川セ {Kawase} | LL margin, publisher's seal: カワグチ {Kawaguchi} | LR margin: 彫前田摺小松　版権所有 {hori Maeda suri Komatsu, hanken shoyū} (carved by Maeda, printed by Komatsu, copyright)
medium: Woodblock print, ink and color on paper
text:
On back: red seal 参百五拾枚限絶版、第二十九號 {sanbyakugojū mai kagiri zeppan, dai nijūkyū gō} (edition of 350, no. 29); stamp: MADE IN JAPAN. 
First edition, published by Kawaguchi alone.
title: Snow at the Sacred Bridge in Nikkō
